skill.name: sop-product-launch
skill.description: Complete product launch workflow coordinating 15+ specialist agents across research, development, marketing, sales, and operations. Uses sequential and parallel orchestration for 10-week launch timeline.
skill.summary: Complete product launch workflow coordinating 15+ specialist agents across research, development, ma...
skill.author: DNYoussef

security_audit.summary: This skill is a workflow orchestration template that defines Task() calls for multi-agent coordination. It contains no executable code, network calls, file operations, or external commands. The skill only provides JavaScript pseudocode examples showing how to structure agent tasks.

content.user_title: Launch products with AI agent orchestration
content.value_statement: Product launches require coordinating multiple teams and tasks over months. This skill orchestrates 15+ specialized AI agents to handle research, development, marketing, sales, and operations in a systematic 10-week timeline.
actual_capabilities: Orchestrates 15+ specialized agents across launch phases
Coordinates sequential and parallel task execution
Manages 10-week structured timeline with defined deliverables
Integrates memory storage for cross-agent data sharing
Provides complete workflow from research to post-launch monitoring
limitations: Memory namespace organization must be maintained

use_cases.title: Complete startup product launch
use_cases.description: Coordinate all aspects of launching a new product from market research through post-launch optimization

use_cases.title: Enterprise feature rollout
use_cases.description: Manage complex feature launches requiring coordination across development, marketing, and sales teams

use_cases.title: Client product launches
use_cases.description: Deliver structured product launches for clients with predictable timelines and deliverables

prompt_templates.title: Basic product launch
prompt_templates.prompt: Use sop-product-launch to orchestrate a complete product launch for our new project management SaaS tool targeting remote teams

prompt_templates.title: Feature enhancement launch
prompt_templates.prompt: Coordinate launch of our AI-powered analytics feature including API updates, documentation, and marketing campaign

prompt_templates.title: Multi-platform launch
prompt_templates.prompt: Execute synchronized launch across web app, iOS/Android apps, and public API with coordinated marketing push

prompt_templates.title: Enterprise rollout
prompt_templates.prompt: Manage enterprise product launch including compliance audits, security reviews, sales enablement, and customer onboarding

output_examples.input: Launch our new AI writing assistant tool
output: Week 1-2: Market research completed, competitor analysis shows 3 major players with pricing gaps
Week 3-6: Backend API deployed, React frontend live, mobile apps submitted to stores
Week 5-8: Marketing campaign ready, 50 blog posts created, sales deck finalized
Week 9: Product launched across all channels, 1,200 signups in first week
Week 10+: Conversion rate 3.2%, churn rate 2.1%, weekly growth 15%

best_practices: Customize agent assignments based on your specific product requirements
Store critical data in memory namespaces for cross-phase retrieval
Run weekly reviews to track progress against success metrics
Adjust parallel/sequential flows based on team dependencies
anti_patterns: Don't skip market research phase - it drives all downstream decisions
Avoid running all tasks in parallel without considering dependencies
Don't ignore post-launch monitoring - optimization continues after launch

faq.question: Is this compatible with standard Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill uses standard Task() calls and memory storage that work with Claude Code and compatible frameworks

faq.question: Can I adjust the 10-week timeline?
faq.answer: The timeline is structured but phases can be compressed or extended based on product complexity and team size

faq.question: How does agent coordination work?
faq.answer: The skill uses sequential workflows for dependent tasks and parallel execution for independent work streams

faq.question: Is my product data safe during the launch?
faq.answer: All data is stored in your local memory namespaces - no external services or data transmission is required

faq.question: What if some agents are unavailable?
faq.answer: The workflow can adapt by reassigning tasks to available agents or running tasks sequentially instead of parallel

faq.question: How does this compare to traditional project management?
faq.answer: Unlike static Gantt charts, this skill provides active agent orchestration with real-time adaptation and memory-based coordination
